attributes.action: consider as The City of Liverpool becomes the Capital of Culture in 2008. He recognises the efforts Mr. Ken Dodd of Knotty Ash, Liverpool - Comedian by recommeding him to Her Majesty Queen for a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ken Dodd is comedian of over 50 years standing. He is a Son of Liverpool - Born and bred there and still living in the family home in Knotty Ash.

Throughout his time in the entertainment industry he has done considerable work on behalf of various Charities.

As Liverpool becomes European Capital of Culture in 2008 what more fitting tribute than to see one of its most famous Sons being Knighted.
